name: Guardromon
effect: ＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)[Your Turn] This Digimon can't attack.
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking] You may trash 1 Digimon card with [Machine] or [Cyborg] in its traits in your hand to ＜Draw 2＞. (Draw 2 cards from your deck.)
